info.description: Automatically tag images using AI services

entries.entry: Automatically tag images using AI services

config.property: The base URL where the image recognition server runs. This URL must be accessible for users using this plugin. - Elvis 6.7+ (default): Configure an Elvis API plugin that proxies to the image recognition server and specify the path relative to the Elvis Server, for example: /plugins/recognition_api - Elvis 5 - 6.6: Use the image recognition server endpoint as configured in config.ts, for example: https://elvis-ai.mycompany.com /plugins/elvis_ai

property.name: clarifaiModelSelection
property.description: Comma separated list of available Clarifai label detection models a user can choose from. Leave empty to hide this option from the dialog. Supported values: GENERAL,FOOD,TRAVEL,WEDDING,APPAREL,CELEBRITY
